Data Fields
pmhalDpll Struct Reference

Each PLL in the Soc has to be instantiated with the below data. More...

#include <hw_pmhal_data.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t fracMDivRegAddr
 

Detailed Description

Each PLL in the Soc has to be instantiated with the below data.

Field Documentation

uint8_t pmhalDpll::dpllType

Indicates DPLL type - ADPLLS or ADPLLLJ.

uint8_t pmhalDpll::edgePropertyEnum

points to the edge Property of this DPLL

uint32_t pmhalDpll::fracMDivRegAddr

Register address for the fractional M divider

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllAutoIdleMask

Pll AutoIdle register Mask address.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllAutoIdleRegAddr

Pll AutoIdle register address.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllClkDcoLdoRegAddr

CLKDCOLOD register address. It includes control and status for CLKDCOLDO configuration.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllClkModeRegAddr

Clock mode register address. It has configurations for bypass mode, clock ramp, auto-recalibration, low power mode, spread spectrum configuration etc...

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllClkSel2RegAddr

Clock select2 register. This register provides DPLL fractional multiplier factor control and BandWidth Control for PER DPLL.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllClkSelRegAddr

Clock select register. It has configurations for DPLL multiplier, divider, duty cycle correction and bypass clock selection configurations.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllDivElemMask

Pll Div Elem register Mask address.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllIdleStatusRegAddr

Idle state register address. It indicates the DPLL lock/unlock(bypass) status.

uint8_t pmhalDpll::pllModesSupportedMask

Pll Supported modes register Mask address.

uint8_t pmhalDpll::pllModesSupportedModes

Power Modes - bypass (including type) and lock mode.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllMulElemMask

Pll Div Elem register Mask address.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllSscDeltaMstepRegAddr

Delta MStep register. It controls the DeltaMStep parameter which is used for Spread Spectrum Clocking technique.

uint32_t pmhalDpll::pllSscModfreqDivRegAddr

Modulation frequency divide register. It controls the Modulation Frequency (FM) for Spread Spectrum Clocking technique .

pmhalDpllPostDiv_t* pmhalDpll::postDividers

List of post dividers available in this DPLL.

uint8_t pmhalDpll::postDividersMax

Number of post dividers in this DPLL.
